title: Digital Education Program for Supporting Decision-Making of Parents Using Donated Gametes

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic reproductive medicine and ethical concepts
context.additional_context: Training in applying digital decision-making tools to real-life counseling scenarios for practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three ethical and emotional issues that may arise when using donated gametes.
Learners can construct parent-child conversation scenarios in at least two types using digital decision-making tools.
Learners can analyze case studies provided in digital content based on experiential learning theory and create at least one practical guide.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
